DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether use gene expression score blood assay change diagnostic test pattern patient refer cardiologist evaluation chest pain anginal equivalent symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Molecular Personalized Coronary Gene Expression Test Cardiology Practice Pattern ( IMPACT-CARD )
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective cohort 88 subject receive gene expression score assay compare retrospective cohort 83 subject receive assay .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Stable chest pain , typical atypical angina anginal equivalent 2 . The patient sign appropriate Institutional Review Board approve Informed Consent Form . 1 . History myocardial infarction 2 . Current myocardial infarct ( MI ) acute coronary syndrome 3 . Current New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) class III IV congestive heart failure symptoms 4 . Any previous coronary revascularization 5 . Any individual : 1 . Diabetes 2 . Suspected unstable angina 3 . Systemic infection 4 . Systemic inflammatory condition 6 . Any individual currently take : 1 . Steroids 2 . Immunosuppressive agent 3 . Chemotherapeutic agent 7 . Recipient organ transplant
